description: MINUTE ORDER of 9/23/04 by Hon. Rebecca R. Pallmeyer : Defendants' motion to dismiss Doc. No. [16-1] is granted with respect to Committee defendants without prejudice, and otherwise denied. Plaintiff has leave to file an amended complaint, if any, on or before 10/15/04. The court strikes plaintiff's motion for class certification [28-1] but will permit plaintiff to re-file that motion also on or before 10/15/04, as the parties are now prepared to brief it. Defendants' answer to the amended complaint (or to this complaint, if plaintiff elects to stand on it) to be filed on or before 11/5/04. Rule 16 conference is set for 11/19/04, at 9:30 a.m., Entered Memorandum Opinion and Order. Mailed notice by judge's staff (eav) (Entered: 09/23/2004)

Herzog, (78 in 1:08-cv-10586-LTS, 186 in 1:08-cv-04772-LTS) MOTION to Dismiss. filed by BMO Capital Markets, (163 in 1:08-cv-04772-LTS) MOTION to Dismiss the Consolidated Class Action Complaint, filed by Robert Lewis, (181 in 1:08-cv-04772-LTS) MOTION to Dismiss Plaintiffs' Amended Consolidated Complaint, filed by Joseph Cassano, (184 in 1:08-cv-04772-LTS) MOTION to Dismiss the Consolidated Class Action Complaint, filed by Edmund S.W. Tse, (171 in 1:08-cv-04772-LTS) MOTION to Dismiss Plaintiffs' Consolidated Class Action Complaint, filed by Steven Bensinger, (190 in 1:08-cv-04772-LTS) MOTION to Strike Exhibits Submitted by Defendants in Connection With Their Motions to Dismiss the Consolidated Class Action Complaint. filed by State of Michigan Retirement Systems, (156 in 1:08-cv-04772-LTS) MOTION to Dismiss the Consolidated Class Action Complaint, filed by Andrew Forster, (153 in 1:08-cv-04772-LTS) MOTION to Dismiss, filed by Alan Frost, (158 in 1:08-cv-04772-LTS) MOTION to Dismiss the Consolidated Class Action Complaint, filed by Martin Sullivan. Plaintiffs' claims asserted against Bancra IMI S.p.A. and Daiwa Securities SMBC Europe Ltd. are dismissed without prejudice pursuant to FRCP 4(m). Plaintiffs' request for leave to re-serve defendant Calyon is granted. Defendants' motions to dismiss the Complaint are denied in all respect. This Opinion and Order resolves docket entry nos. 153,156,158,160,163,165,171,174,175,178,181,184,186, and 190. The Cour will issue a separate order setting a pretrial conference. (Signed by Judge Laura Taylor Swain on 9/27/10) Filed In Associated Cases: 1:08-cv-04772-LTS et al.(cd) Modified on 9/29/2010 (ajc). (Entered: 09/27/2010)
